main event: On June 13, 1949, multiple observers at Camp Hood, Texas, reported seeing a bright aerial object with a colorful trail, which moved rapidly in the sky before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as round and emitted a bright light with a pink trail., Observers reported that the object burned a hydrocarbon fuel based on its color trail., The object exhibited a downward spiraling movement before fading out of sight., The sightings were made by U.S. Army officers, considered to be excellent observers., Weather conditions were clear with no significant effect on clouds at the time of the sightings.
sighted object: aerial light with a colorful tail
witness description: U.S. Army officers and personnel from various battalions at Camp Hood
